basics.name: Alik del Risco
basics.label: Senior Software Developer with +8 years of experience as a professional.
basics.summary: Senior Software Engineer with DevOps skills. Contestant in the Caribbean Final of the ACM-ICPC in 2015 and also in many national competitive programming contests during the pre-grade. Passionate for new technologies and sharing knowledge with others, Software Architecture and programming languages. Quick learner who works both independently and in a team, always better in the team. Appreciates the level of organization and planning of the development process, the use of good practices, and the quality of the code.

work.name: Rideco
work.summary: RideCo is the most adopted on-demand cloud-based paratransit and microtransit software among the 10 largest cities in the United States.

work.name: Musala Soft - MagentaZuhause Smart Home
work.summary: Qivicon is an innovative solution for smart homes currently being developed by Deutsche Telekom. I worked as a Backend and Mobile developer the Integration teams, providing the communication with severals vendors of devices.

work.name: Musala Soft - Elopage Media Categorizer
work.summary: Elopage Media Categorizer is a microservice in charge to detect content that is inappropriate, unwanted, or offensive. I worked as a main Backend developer implementing REST endpoints, consuming AWS services, and communicating with the existing microservices.

work.name: Musala Soft - Leanplum React Native SDK
work.summary: I worked as a Mobile developer integrating the existing Android and iOS SDK into a React Native npm package sdks.

work.name: DATYS
work.summary: DATYS is a leading provider of tailored software solutions for Cuban governmental agencies.
